channel.title: I need a cool signature :)
channel.description:
If you possibly can, i need a signature for my username: M5Y Here is a picture of an idea i would like, something like this: [url=http://t0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQo-nXo2Fbucbxnh-d0hMIK-hP5KiZME-dzRaXOfw4AQojGK-cx]http://t0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQo-nXo2Fbucbxnh-d0hMIK-hP5KiZME-dzRaXOfw4AQojGK-cx[/url] but with M5Y of course :P
I found that one in google images, if possible i would just like it with that color of blue Saying: M5Y You can make it say vouches too if you want to, but mainly that color of blue and that background: M5Y.
Hopefully this is detailed enough, sorry if it isn't :(
